___type.description: Proxy handling. One of: request-response, request-only, headers, redirect, system, internal, request-response-1.0. The default is request-response

___pathPattern.description: Path pattern match. * matches any path. {x} matches one or more characters but not slash

___redirectPath.description: If given, path that we internally redirect to

___rewritePath.description: Rewrite path. e.g. have filter rewrite '/*' to '/events/*'

___phase.description: If given, may be auth, pre or post

___methods.description: List of methods GET, POST,.. * (for all)
